info.title: Airport On-Time Performance
info.description: Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token.

get.summary: Returns a percentage of on-time flight departures from a given airport.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will depart from the give airport. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-12-25

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
477     | INVALID FORMAT
572     | INVALID OPTION
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED               
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING

source.title: Issue_Source

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error
